creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: woman in a dark dress and large hat sitting slightly forward on park bench; holding a large paper or newspaper on lap; foliage to L and rear of bench
inscription:
Signature

-- in graphite on outsite of mat: Henri Somm 1844-1967 | \"Rendezvous\" | etching and aquatint | initialled in pencil | 150-
-- in graphite on inside mount: S392
medium: Etching and aquatint on Japan paper
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: initialed in graphite in left margin: [HS], and opposite this, possibly combined letters: [ES]
title: Le Rendezvous
